name: Flight-capable wings
description: You may fly at your movement speed.  Under stressful flying conditions, you will need to perform Athletics Tests or risk failing and gaining the exhausted Status.

name: Quick Learner
description: 5 bonus Development Points.

name: Naturalist
description: Rolls in Forest environments gain +1.

name: Undergrounder
description: Rolls in Underground environments gain +1.

name: Seasider
description: Rolls aboard ships, and above or underwater gain +1.

name: Citysider
description: Rolls in large cities gain +1.

name: Sensorium
description: You can see in darkness to 10sq.  Immune to Blind and Deaf Status Effects.  Perception Move +1 Bonus.  No disadvantage when attacking invisible or hidden creatures.

name: Sure-footed
description: You gain +1sq Jump vertical, +3sq Fall vertical.  You are immune to difficult terrain.  You cannot be tripped.  Athletics Move +2 Bonus.

name: Influencer
description: You gain a +1 Bonus to: Perception, Influence, Subterfuge, Creativity, Stealther and Mental Resistance.

name: Flow Battery
description: Once per day as a Free Action, you can release energy at Touch that applies Verve Loss equal to 5 + your maximum Skill Purchase, and is of the type of one of your Magical Synergies.  This attack automatically hits and is considered a Critical Cast.  You regain this ability after a Long Rest, or whenever a Spell is Cast on you.

name: Hardy
description: Any time you take Verve Damage, you take 1 less.

name: Push your limits
description: As a Free Action, you may sacrifice 20 Verve to use an additional Expertise on a Move.

name: Natural Athlete
description: Move sq +1.  You can perform a Relocate for an additional hour before requiring an Athletics Roll to check Exhaustion.

name: Fated
description: Your rolls count towards World Changers when you roll a 19 or 20.

name: Lucky
description: You may reroll one Roll per day.

name: Quick Sleeper
description: Taking a Long Rest is only 6 hours.

name: Deep Breaths
description: You may hold your breath safely for 5 minutes.  You can perform a Relocate for an additional hour before requiring an Athletics Roll to check Exhaustion.

name: Animal Kinship
description: You gain a +1 Bonus to Animal Empathy, and can learn advanced Moves when you only have 3 points in Animal Empathy.

name: Channeller
description: Bonus Mana: 5

name: Conduit
description: Bonus Psi: 3

name: Vervatious
description: Bonus Verve: 15

name: Jack of All Trades
description: Your maximum Skill Purchase gains a +1 Bonus.

name: Faeform
description: You transform your body as per the Transmute Flesh Spell Standard Effect, 3 times per day, with the effects lasting for 2 hours.  You always adopt the same form, which you choose at character creation from Human, Elven, Dwarven or Halfling of any gender.

name: Tiny Stature
description: Unavailable for players.  Defend Skill +3, MoveSq. -2, Strength-based Moves -2.

name: Small Stature
description: Defend Skill +1, MoveSq. -1

name: Medium Stature
description: No change

name: Larger Stature
description: Defend Skill -1, Strength-based Moves +1

name: Huge Stature
description: Unavailable for players.  Defend Skill -3, Starting Verve +20, Strength-based Moves +2.
